articles.title: Japan on high alert as monkeypox infections spread overseas - asianews.network
articles.description: The government has issued guidelines calling for officials to be on high alert for suspected cases, but experts say there is no need to be excessively worried based on the low infection and fatality rates of monkeypox.
articles.content:
